en.label: The Third Horizon Calendar (Coriolis)
en.description: The calendar system used throughout the Third Horizon in Coriolis. Features 9 Segments of 37 days each with intercalary holidays marking important religious and cultural observances.

months.name: First Segment
months.description: The first segment of the Cycle, beginning after the Founding Day celebrations.

months.name: Second Segment
months.description: The second segment of the Cycle, a time of renewed trade and commerce across the Third Horizon.

months.name: Third Segment
months.description: The third segment of the Cycle, marking the midpoint of the first half of the year.

months.name: Fourth Segment
months.description: The fourth segment of the Cycle, often associated with pilgrimages to holy sites.

months.name: Fifth Segment
months.description: The fifth segment of the Cycle, the midpoint of the annual journey through the stars.

months.name: Sixth Segment
months.description: The sixth segment of the Cycle, traditionally a time of preparation and planning.

months.name: Seventh Segment
months.description: The seventh segment of the Cycle, when the Icons' influence is said to be strongest.

months.name: Eighth Segment
months.description: The eighth segment of the Cycle, approaching the year's end with reflection and accounting.

months.name: Ninth Segment
months.description: The ninth and final segment of the Cycle, culminating in preparations for the new year.

weekdays.name: First Day
weekdays.description: The first day of the nine-day week, traditionally devoted to prayer and meditation.

weekdays.name: Second Day
weekdays.description: The second day of the nine-day week, a day for commerce and trade.

weekdays.name: Third Day
weekdays.description: The third day of the nine-day week, often reserved for education and learning.

weekdays.name: Fourth Day
weekdays.description: The fourth day of the nine-day week, dedicated to craft and creation.

weekdays.name: Fifth Day
weekdays.description: The fifth day of the nine-day week, the midpoint of the weekly cycle.

weekdays.name: Sixth Day
weekdays.description: The sixth day of the nine-day week, traditionally for social gatherings.

weekdays.name: Seventh Day
weekdays.description: The seventh day of the nine-day week, a day of preparation.

weekdays.name: Eighth Day
weekdays.description: The eighth day of the nine-day week, often devoted to family and community.

weekdays.name: Ninth Day
weekdays.description: The ninth and final day of the week, traditionally a day of rest and contemplation.

intercalary.name: Founding Day
intercalary.description: The first major holiday celebrating the founding of the Third Horizon, marking the arrival of the Zenith and the new era of humanity among the stars.

intercalary.name: Icons' Festival
intercalary.description: The second major holiday devoted to honoring the Icons, the mystical forces that guide fate throughout the Third Horizon.

intercalary.name: Cyclade's End
intercalary.description: The third major holiday marking the end of one Cycle and the preparation for the next, a time of reflection, celebration, and renewal.

dateFormats.long: The {{ss-day format="ordinal"}} day of the {{ss-month format="name"}} in Cycle {{year}}
